extendedInfo.description: Hand-drawing style physics game. All you need to do is shooting the little guy to hit the star, simple? Weâll see who is on the global ranking boardNew feature! Put your friends (or your enemies) face on a ragdoll by importing images from your SD card.90 levelsUPDATEMinor bugs fixed

reviews.title: No support for Nexus 4
reviews.comment: Error in the coding resulting in the canon now being replaced with some random lines of code. Still playable but annoying. I presume is because the developer have bail on this app long ago
reviews.author: dZus Dapple

reviews.comment: good game ... really s**t company, I bought this game a month back and now it is telling me its not licensed and I have to buy it again.. rubbish..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Boguht it off Android market, worked for a few days. Now gives me errors saying it\'s not licensed and to buy it again, despite a valid net connection.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update, please.
reviews.comment: Not only is it not qhd friendly, it\'s still not WVGA compatible. This means only 480x320 screens look decent. 480x320 and decent in the same sentence hasn\'t been used in the same sentence since 2007!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: My favorite game yet on android hands down. This and fruit ninja are great. 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: What a brilliantly made game. Excellent physics. I can\'t believe I,ll ever complete all 90 levels. Some are impossible I\'m sure
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: My 5-yr-old is better at figuring out how to shoot the targets than I am! Fun game & has never FC\'d. Motorola Backflip
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game... horrible piracy control
reviews.comment: The game I like but for some strange reason they need to check very often that I actually purchased the game and this is done using a connection. The problem is that I mostly play games when in airplanes or the subway, and neither of those situations tends to have an internet connection, thus forcing me close the app and not letting me play when I want to play a game I paid for. (I did change phones since I bought the game)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: One of the best games out there.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great on Epic 4G. Pretty smooth.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it... 5 stars when it\'s formatted for the Galaxy Tab screen

reviews.comment: Keep force close when using your own pics. NEXUS S. PAID MONEY and FORCE CLOSE = REFUND.

reviews.comment: Won\'t work anymore with the validation thing, even though I am connected and I paid for it weeks ago.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The game itself is ok and quite entertaining, but for some stupid reason they make me prove, over and over again I actually purchased the damned game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The wife didnt know what to think when she saw me shooting her out of a canon! Good fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Requires connection to the internet to play. What happens when you guys go out of business!? Refunding. Did not even try to play.

reviews.comment: Stopped working on my stock EVO 2.2. All I get is a white screen now. Tried reinstalling, didn\'t fix it.

reviews.comment: Super fun. Hard enough but not frustrating.

reviews.comment: Amazing really addictive

reviews.comment: Love it! After the dev accidentally gave me the full version, I decided to buy it.
